Sentencas: Within this study a novel high fuel utilizing (High-uf) SOFC system is presented with special focus on the formation of nickel oxide, system efficiency and the required cell area at a fixed system performance of 1 MW.
Titulo: A high fuel utilizing solid oxide fuel cell cycle with regard to the formation of nickel oxide and power density

Sentencas: Within the High-uf SOFC cycle, a second SOFC stack is used to utilize a further part of the residual hydrogen of the first SOFC stack.
Titulo: A high fuel utilizing solid oxide fuel cell cycle with regard to the formation of nickel oxide and power density

Sentencas: This could be feasible by using an anode gas condenser, which is implemented between the first and the second stack.
Titulo: A high fuel utilizing solid oxide fuel cell cycle with regard to the formation of nickel oxide and power density

Sentencas: This reduces the water fraction of the anode gas and thereby the tendency of nickel oxide formation in case of a further fuel utilization.
Titulo: A high fuel utilizing solid oxide fuel cell cycle with regard to the formation of nickel oxide and power density

Sentencas: Thus, a higher total fuel utilization can be reached with the second SOFC stack.
Titulo: A high fuel utilizing solid oxide fuel cell cycle with regard to the formation of nickel oxide and power density

Sentencas: With the High-uf SOFC cycle, the system efficiency is increased by 7%-points compared to the simple atmospheric SOFC cycle.
Titulo: A high fuel utilizing solid oxide fuel cell cycle with regard to the formation of nickel oxide and power density

Sentencas: Furthermore, the average cell voltage and the fuel utilization are varied to carry out a first optimization of the stack's power density.
Titulo: A high fuel utilizing solid oxide fuel cell cycle with regard to the formation of nickel oxide and power density

Sentencas: The results of this optimization have shown that the required cell area of the simple SOFC cycle can be slightly reduced by decreasing the fuel utilization, whereas the High-uf SOFC cycle shows an opposite effect.
Titulo: A high fuel utilizing solid oxide fuel cell cycle with regard to the formation of nickel oxide and power density

Sentencas: Here, the required cell area can be reduced at constant voltages by increasing the fuel utilization.
Titulo: A high fuel utilizing solid oxide fuel cell cycle with regard to the formation of nickel oxide and power density

Sentencas: Thus, higher system efficiencies could be reached with the High-uf SOFC cycle by using the same cell area as the simple SOFC cycle and at the same tendency of nickel oxide formation.
Titulo: A high fuel utilizing solid oxide fuel cell cycle with regard to the formation of nickel oxide and power density

Sentencas: A second condenser behind the second SOFC stack could be used to increase the carbon dioxide mass fraction up to 92%.
Titulo: A high fuel utilizing solid oxide fuel cell cycle with regard to the formation of nickel oxide and power density

Sentencas: This could be interesting for CO2-sequestring applications as well.
Titulo: A high fuel utilizing solid oxide fuel cell cycle with regard to the formation of nickel oxide and power density
